Each_item.News_content: GE is planning a major restructuring that could split the company into three separate entities, focusing on healthcare, energy, and aviation. Analysts believe this move will unlock significant shareholder value.
BBBY has announced a partnership with a leading e-commerce platform to boost its online sales. This collaboration aims to enhance customer experience and drive revenue growth.
CMCSA reported better-than-expected Q3 earnings, driven by strong subscriber growth in both broadband and streaming services. The stock is expected to see upward momentum following this report.
